articles.title: Russia-Ukraine live news: First grain ship to depart Odesa
articles.description: Turkey’s defence ministry says the first shipment of Ukrainian grain to leave the port of Black Sea city.
articles.content: Turkeys defence ministry says the first shipment of Ukrainian grain to leave the port at 05:30GMT.
